content: In recent decades, such incidents have occurred on a global scale, affecting not only Muslim-majority states in Africa and Asia, but also several countries within the European Union, Russia, Australia, Canada, India and the United States. Such attacks have targeted Muslims and non-Muslims.

title: In 2015 four Islamic extremist groups were responsible for 74% of all deaths from terrorism: ISIS, Boko Haram, the Taliban and Al-Qaeda, according to the Global Terrorism Index 2016.
